alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Camden; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Cumberland; Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Atlantic, Cumberland, east central Salem, southeastern Camden, southeastern Gloucester and northern Cape May Counties through 315 PM EST... At 230 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers with isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from Glassboro to Greenwich. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Atlantic City, Millville, Bridgeton, Ocean City, Cumberland, Pleasantville, Glassboro, Hammonton, Somers Point, Ventnor City, Brigantine, Northfield, Absecon, Clayton, Margate City, Buena, Egg Harbor City, Laurel Lake and Weymouth. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 15 and 48. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 0 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Camden; Cape May; Coastal Atlantic; Cumberland; Gloucester; Salem
